item.title: Need for imaginary numbers and the role of outsiders
item.description: After watching this video by Veritasium. I realized that geometry was the origin of all of algebra, at least a lot of advancements to it. For eg: Let’s take a simple Quadratic Equation x^2 + x = 20, anyone can apply the quadratic formula to solve it but before that, it was Geometry that solved such problems ( I highly recommend you to watch the video to understand how it was done, my notes below might not help you imagine it as clearly as was done in the video)

item.title: How do you send a message to someone 10,000 years in future
item.description: I was listening to this great episode on 99% invisible (one of the best podcasts I listen to). The idea was - How do you communicate with someone 10k years in future to convey them the message that a certain box contains radioactive material and shouldn’t be touched (as it is an existential risk) This was an actual project in the US and they hired a bunch fo artists, communicators etc.
